name: open-jacksonz-medium
description: A CLI to open JacksonZ's Medium profile.
author: tianhaoz95 <tianhaoz@umich.edu>

scripts.docs: mkdir -p ../../website/static/gendocs/open-jacksonz-medium && documentation build ./lib/** -f html -o docs && cp -r ./docs/* ../../website/static/gendocs/open-jacksonz-medium
